name: Pita Boom
description:
Description

"Pita Boom" is a magic tower defense game, the player plays the guardian of the human homeland mage. Using the right hand-held magic wand to draw different magic runes, call out all kinds of powerful magic to repel constantly come to attack the human world pink strange creature - "Pita".

At the beginning of the game, players are in a medieval magic world. One day, in a practice magic process, accidentally hit the "Pita" family of spiritual statue, accident caused the "Pita" family invasion of the human world of war.

When player presses the button on the magic wand, will call out a special magic array. Player need to draw a specific Rune on the array, it will be able to create a variety of powerful magic. There are several kinds of magic that can be created, each magic has different characteristics. Player must follow the "Pita" type of attack, and use the appropriate magic to defeat the "Pita" army.

And when repelling all offensive "Pita", will be considered win the game; the other hand, if let "Pita" capture the guardian of human energy tower, the challenge is failure.
